pr_title: Update resolving logic of project name and polish SentinelConfig

timeline.message:
Update resolving logic of project name and polish SentinelConfig

Signed-off-by: Eric Zhao <sczyh16@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Hhh, so now the max RT is 5000, and not the classic value 4900?
timeline.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText: The magic 4900 often makes users confusing, so I've changed it to 5000. The attribute might be deprecated in future versions.
replies.author: sczyh30

timeline.bodyText: The log info doesn't has prefix [SentinelConfig] like Line#71, and Line#71 move to inside resolveAppType method looks better. It's okay I think and we can do optimize them in the future.
timeline.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText:
The log info doesn't has prefix [SentinelConfig] like Line#71

Actually prefix is not strictly required if the log content is concrete enough :)

Line#71 move to inside resolveAppType method looks better. It's okay I think and we can do optimize them in the future.

Good idea. We may improve this later.
replies.author: sczyh30
